channel.title: www.linkedin.com
channel.description: HISI, Inc. | 137 followers on LinkedIn. Multi-line Adjusting Services | HISI is an Independent Multi-Line Insurance Adjusting Firm serving the insurance industry throughout the southeast United States. Our family owned company was founded in 2002 and has grown to become one of the industry leaders in quality and accurate adjusting. With vast commercial and residential experience, HISI is ready to serve you in daily claims, loss dispute resolution services or as a re-inspection firm that will provide quality third party reports on your current experts.

item.title: #independentadjusters #catadjusters #claimsadjusting #propertyclaims #insuranceadjusters #southeastusa #hisi #hisey | HISI, Inc.
item.description: ️ The National Hurricane Center (NHC) is predicting an above-normal 2025 Atlantic season, with new systems already forming. At Hisey Insurance Services, we are adding to our roster of 1099 Independent Adjusters in response to continued client requests for commitment across the Southeast U.S. We’re hiring for: Daily Property & Daily Casualty (Residential & Commercial) Catastrophe Property Claims (Residential & Commercial) Requirements: ✔️ Active adjuster license(s) ✔️ General Liability/E&O Insurance ✔️ Reliable, safe transportation ✔️ Field tools (ladder, pitch gauge, moisture meter, etc.) ✔️ Tech proficiency: Xactimate/X1 or Symbility Preferred Credentials: If you hold professional certifications such as the Certified Catastrophe Adjuster (CCA™) from the National Insurance Institute, or other CAT designations, please include that in your résumé. How to Apply: 1️⃣ Review our website: https://lnkd.in/eacD4Zxw 2️⃣ Email your résumé to admin@hisinet.com. Please include: --Coverage areas (counties & states) --Years of experience in Residential CAT, Commercial CAT, Daily Property, Daily Casualty --Licenses held and current states --GL/E&O coverage details --Deployment availability --Any industry certifications or credentials (CCA™, GA, Flood, etc.) This is your opportunity to join a firm that values professionalism, integrity, and long-term commitment. #IndependentAdjusters #CATAdjusters #ClaimsAdjusting #PropertyClaims #InsuranceAdjusters #SoutheastUSA #HISI #Hisey

item.title: Hisey Insurance Services: Expert Catastrophe Claims Solutions | HISI, Inc. posted on the topic | LinkedIn
item.description: Hisey Insurance Services (HISI): Serving the Southeast U.S. and Atlantic Coast When catastrophes strike, the difference between confusion and confidence is the team you call on. At HISI, we provide comprehensive claims solutions tailored to carriers, firms, and policyholders across the region. Our services include: -Catastrophe (CAT) Claims Handling – Deployments throughout the Southeast U.S. and up the Atlantic Coast, delivering rapid response to hurricanes, hail, wind, and severe storm events. -Daily Claims Adjusting – Accurate, timely service for residential and commercial property claims. -Appraisal & Umpire Services – Neutral, professional resolution of claim disputes. -Peer Review & Expert Services – Independent file evaluations for litigation, settlement, or process improvement. -Consulting & Advisory – Strategic guidance to streamline claims and reduce disputes. At HISI, our mission is clear: provide clarity, confidence, and trusted expertise in every claim. Learn more: hiseyinsuranceservices.com

item.title: #insuranceeducation #cecredits #networking #bbqcompetition #floridainsuranceevent #professionalgrowth #oca | HISI, Inc.
item.description: The 13th Annual OCA CE Seminar & Cook-off is Almost Here! Save the Date: March 13, 2025! Florida's Largest Insurance Event is back and already shaping up to be the biggest and best yet! We already have nearly 300 attendees registered, including representatives from 100 companies and 20 insurance carriers—and there’s still time to join the fun! Adjusters: Don’t miss this unique opportunity to earn your CE credits in an exciting and engaging environment. Cooking Teams: Think you have what it takes to claim BBQ glory? Bring your A-game and join the BBQ Cook-off in the ultimate test of skill and flavor! Sponsors: Only a few sponsorship spots remain—secure your space to connect with the largest crowd of insurance professionals in the Sunshine State! What to Expect? This isn’t just an event—it’s an experience! Earn CE credits in Florida’s most vibrant insurance community. Network with industry leaders while enjoying good ole fashioned BBQ. Participate in or watch the BBQ competition in the spirit of camaraderie and fun. Register now: Orlando Claims Association, Inc. - Annual CEU Seminar and Cook-Off Don’t Miss Out! This is the largest and most fun way to learn, network, and grow while enjoying the Sunshine State. We can’t wait to see you on March 13th! #InsuranceEducation #CECredits #Networking #BBQCompetition #FloridaInsuranceEvent #ProfessionalGrowth #OCA

item.title: Join Our Growing Team of Property & Casualty Field Adjusters in Texas! We’re expanding our roster of property and casualty claims adjusters to meet the needs of our clients in both residential and… | HISI, Inc.
item.description: Join Our Growing Team of Property & Casualty Field Adjusters in Texas! We’re expanding our roster of property and casualty claims adjusters to meet the needs of our clients in both residential and commercial fields. If you’re an experienced field adjuster looking to make an impact, we want to hear from you! What We’re Looking For: • Experience: 3+ years of CAT/Daily property adjusting experience. • Licensing: Active Texas Insurance Adjuster License. • Expertise: Strong knowledge of property claims, estimating, and reporting. • Tools of the Trade: A functional computer with an active Xactimate license, high-speed internet, ladder, measuring tools, and a valid driver’s license. • Efficiency: Ability to manage a reasonable claim volume with accuracy and speed. • Customer Focus: Superior customer service skills and a genuine desire to assist policyholders. • Physical Requirements: Ability to travel, climb ladders, and perform investigative tasks as needed. Ready to Join Us? Submit your résumé to admin@hisinet.com for consideration. We’re excited to connect with talented professionals and grow our team!
